players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie."
You: "I don't have info, but if Charlie is mafia, why didn't he kill Bob? Maybe he was protecting Bob."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob, I was protecting him. Maybe you misheard. I'm just a villager."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and confirmed he's mafia. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie. Alice, if you don't know, trust the evidence."
You: "I think Diana is the detective, so trust her. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I don't have info, but if Charlie is mafia, why didn't he kill Bob? Maybe he was protecting Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Bob, I was protecting him. Maybe you misheard. I'm just a villager."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and confirmed he's mafia. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie. Alice, if you don't know, trust the evidence."
Alice: "I think Diana is the detective, so trust her. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I don't have info, but if Charlie is mafia, why didn't he kill Bob? Maybe he was protecting Bob."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob, I was protecting him. Maybe you misheard. I'm just a villager."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and confirmed he's mafia. Bob was killed by him. Vote Charlie. Alice, if you don't know, trust the evidence."
Alice: "I think Diana is the detective, so trust her. Charlie is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
